directions: Brush cut side of ciabatta rolls with oil. Place rolls, cut side up, on baking sheet. Broil until rolls begin to brown around edges, about 2 minutes. Spread apple butter and mustard on each roll half. Top with ham, then cheese. Broil until cheese melts and begins to brown in spots, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle with chives and serve.
ingredients: 3 ciabatta rolls, halved horizontally, or 6 1/2-inch-thick slices country-style bread
1 1/4 pounds Black Forest ham, thinly sliced
12 ounces extra-sharp white cheddar cheese, sliced
title: Open-Face Ham, Cheddar, and Apple Butter Sandwiches
